alert.note: Alert for Banner; Kimball; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 2:57PM CDT until November 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts to 65 MPH. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Scotts Bluff County, Banner County and Kimball County. In Wyoming, Goshen County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds will create hazardous travel for motorists on Interstate 80 between Wyoming mile marker 383 and the Nebraska state line to Nebraska Interstate 80 mile marker 35. Light weight and high profile vehicles including light load semis and those towing camper trailers will be especially at risk.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
